channel.title: Look at my ::yell how can i,

item.title: Look at my ::yell how can i,
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");

        } else if (playerRights < 1) {
              PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
         } else if (playerRights == 1) {
             PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod] " + playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        } else if (playerRights > 1) {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin] " + playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }

}[/code]

Theres no errors in that one, make sure you replace ALL of your old yell method, including one curly parenthesis from the command before it.

Read full topic
